divs: sighting detailswas on my patio and looking at stars and noticed a triangular formation of stars..then one of the lights\stars started moving i thought at first maybe a satalite but then it continued to move very fast up and away in a southeast angle until it disappeared.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Brighton
There were no other sightings in Brighton on or around August 20th 2007
Summary: Bright star like light moving very fast up and away and then disappeared.
